metadata.title: USN-6182-1 -- pngcheck vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that pngcheck incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6182-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  pngcheck - 2.3.0-7ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
